name: Operation: Evac
description:
Welcome to Operation: Evac, the nightmare of kaiju survival! You're stuck in a city under siege by a terrifying crab-like Kaiju that's hunting you down. With only three minutes until the city is destroyed, your mission is to gather the essential evac parts without drawing the kaiju's attention. If it catches you, you'll be devoured alive! The stakes are high, and the tension is palpable as you navigate through the city's shadowy alleys and deserted buildings, haunted by the kaiju's echoing clicks. Will you be able to stay one step ahead of the creature and make it out alive? This heart-pumping game of horror and survival will test your nerve and cunning. Can you survive the kaiju's relentless pursuit and escape before it's too late?

Controls: First Person Controls

Movement:  WASD + Mouse

Double Jump: Space

Interact: E

Low Quality HTML Version & High Quality Windows Downloadable available!
